Uses of Class
ninetynine.Card

    • Uses of Card in ninetynine

      Methods in ninetynine that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card Deck.deal()
      Returns the top card on the deck and removes it from the deck
      Card Deck.getCard()
      Get a card from the top of the deck but DO NOT remove it!
      Card Deck.getCard(int idx)
      Get an individual card from the deck but DO NOT remove it!
      Card[] Deck.getCards()
      Gets the cards in the deck
      Methods in ninetynine with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Deck.add(Card card)
      Add a card to this deck
      int SortByCard.compare(Card a, Card b) 
      void Player.draw(Card card)
      Add the provided card to this player's deck
      void Deck.removeCard(Card card)
      Remove the provided card from the deck if it exists
